Purview.definition: the body of a statute or the part that begins with Be it enacted and ends before the repealing clause 2
Purview.origin: [Anglo-French purveu est it is provided (opening phrase of a statute)]

1.definition: the body of a statute or the part that begins withand ends before the repealing clause
1.Be it enacted: and ends before the repealing clause

2.definition: the limit or scope of a law
